title: The Secrets of Inchon: The Untold Story of the Most Daring Covert Mission of the Korean War
description: An account based on the experiences of a naval lieutenant who witnessed a covert Korean War mission firsthand discusses his two-week assignment to obtain vital intelligence in the wake of firefights, night raids, hand-to-hand combat, and a small naval battle. 50,000 first printing.
author: Eugene Franklin Clark
